attributes.review: This app is glitchy and very racist! The news you get as notifications is clearly FAKE NEWS and is even worst than what the do nothing dems put on CNN. Clearly a SCAM, will not recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:
donald, 
i would like to inform u that this app is seriously dangerous!!!! as a fellow racist, sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, ignorant, piece of 💩, i stan u🙈🙈🙈. anyways so... i do not recommend this app to anyone. as soon as i opened the app i noticed everyone around me suddenly started screaming these horrific things. one of them being “bernie 2020”!!! like who in the hell would support such a kind, loving, smart, caring, respectful, woman-loving, cute old man?

attributes.review: this is a terrible app design, the second i opened it it made me more racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, and PEDOPHILIC 🤢. i’m so disappointed in our president. i guess we’re just going to have to vote him out 🤷‍♀️
attributes.title: so disappointed

attributes.review: every time i open the app it just glitches and goes back to my home screen, and a couple of times it even shocked me through my phone. all i wanted to do was help support the president but that app really makes it impossible. has some kinks that should have been worked out before it was released to the public.
attributes.title: one star app

attributes.review: After using this app my dog started floating and spinning in the air I’ve gained 4 different learning disabilities and all the cabinets in my house opened so I decided to go to sleep and when I woke up my house was flying
